creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: coat/robe with vibrant colors on the outside in a graphic style pattern; cuffs and outlining the opening of the coat is an embroidered pattern, also on collar; embroidered tie on each side, each with a tassel; inside lining of coat has cotton fabric--red with floral pattern in pastel colors
